item.title: Understanding Typescript Generics
item.description: Introduction I would like to take what might be considered somewhat of an unusual approach when it comes to explaining Generics in this article by grounding my examples in real-life use cases. We’ll start by going through a real-world illustration where we can organically discover the pains of a world without Generics, for it’s said that the best way to understand a concept is to merely be pointed in the right direction such that you can make connections yourself.
